verses.verse: וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went אֲבִימֶ֤לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֻבַּ֙עַל֙ <WH3378> of Jerubbaal שְׁכֶ֔מָה <WH7927> to Shechem אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחֵ֖י <WH251> brethren אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> unto his mother's וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> and communed אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about וְאֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole מִשְׁפַּ֛חַת <WH4940> with them and with all the family בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house אֲבִ֥י <WH1> father אִמּ֖וֹ <WH517> of his mother's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> Speak נָ֞א <WH4994> now בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <WH241> I pray you in the ears כָל־ <WH3605> of all בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> of all the men שְׁכֶם֮ <WH7927> of Shechem מַה־ <WH4100> Which טּ֣וֹב <WH2896> Whether [is] better לָכֶם֒ הַמְשֹׁ֨ל <WH4910> reign בָּכֶ֜ם שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> [which are] threescore and ten אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> persons כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> for you either that all the sons יְרֻבַּ֔עַל <WH3378> of Jerubbaal אִם־ <WH518> or מְשֹׁ֥ל <WH4910> reign בָּכֶ֖ם אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> over you or that one וּזְכַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH2142> over you? remember כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that עַצְמֵכֶ֥ם <WH6106> also that I [am] your bone וּבְשַׂרְכֶ֖ם <WH1320> and your flesh אָנִֽי׃ <WH589> I

וַיְדַבְּר֨וּ <WH1696> spake אֲחֵֽי־ <WH251> brethren אִמּ֜וֹ <WH517> And his mother's עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> his behalf בְּאָזְנֵי֙ <WH241> of him in the ears כָּל־ <WH3605> all בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> of all the men שְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> of Shechem אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וַיֵּ֤ט <WH5186> inclined לִבָּם֙ <WH3820> and their hearts אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> to follow אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אָמְר֖וּ <WH559> for they said אָחִ֥ינוּ <WH251> He [is] our brother הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> They

וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> And they gave לוֹ֙ שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> him threescore and ten כֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> [pieces] of silver מִבֵּ֖ית <WH1004> out of the house בַּ֣עַל בְּרִ֑ית <WH1170> of Baalberith וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֨ר <WH7936> hired בָּהֶ֜ם אֲבִימֶ֗לֶךְ <WH40> wherewith Abimelech אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH582> persons רֵיקִים֙ <WH7386> vain וּפֹ֣חֲזִ֔ים <WH6348> and light וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> along אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> him

וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> And he went בֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִיו֙ <WH1> unto his father's עָפְרָ֔תָה <WH6084> at Ophrah וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֞ג <WH2026> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָ֧יו <WH251> his brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons יְרֻבַּ֛עַל <WH3378> of Jerubbaal שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> [being] threescore and ten אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> persons עַל־ <WH5921> and אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> upon one וַיִּוָּתֵ֞ר <WH3498> was left יוֹתָ֧ם <WH3147> notwithstanding yet Jotham בֶּן־ <WH1121> son יְרֻבַּ֛עַל <WH3378> of Jerubbaal הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> the youngest כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נֶחְבָּֽא׃ <WH2244> for he hid ס

וַיֵּאָ֨סְפ֜וּ <WH622> gathered together כָּל־ <WH3605> All בַּעֲלֵ֤י <WH1167> And all the men שְׁכֶם֙ <WH7927> of Shechem וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and all the house מִלּ֔וֹא <WH4407> Millo וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> went וַיַּמְלִ֥יכוּ <WH4427> and made אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech לְמֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> king עִם־ <WH5973> by אֵל֥וֹן <WH436> by the plain מֻצָּ֖ב <WH5324> of the pillar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7927> that [was] in Shechem

וַיַּגִּ֣דוּ <WH5046> And when they told לְיוֹתָ֗ם <WH3147> [it] to Jotham וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> and stood בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> in the top הַר־ <WH2022> of mount גְּרִזִ֔ים <WH1630> Gerizim וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> and lifted up קוֹל֖וֹ <WH6963> his voice וַיִּקְרָ֑א <WH7121> and cried וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֗ם שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> unto them Hearken אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> unto me ye men שְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> of Shechem וְיִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> may hearken אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> about אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> that God

הָל֤וֹךְ <WH1980> Once הָֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> went הָעֵצִ֔ים <WH6086> The trees לִמְשֹׁ֥חַ <WH4886> [on a time] to anoint עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> a king וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> over them and they said לַזַּ֖יִת <WH2132> unto the olive tree [מְלֹוכָה כ] (מָלְכָ֥ה <WH4427> consult ק) עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> over

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ הַזַּ֔יִת <WH2132> But the olive tree הֶחֳדַ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH2308> unto them Should I leave אֶת־ <WH853> דִּשְׁנִ֔י <WH1880> my fatness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בִּ֛י יְכַבְּד֥וּ <WH3513> wherewith by me they honour אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וַאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> and men וְהָ֣לַכְתִּ֔י <WH1980> and go לָנ֖וּעַ <WH5128> to be promoted עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> carpenter
וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> And the trees לַתְּאֵנָ֑ה <WH8384> to the fig tree לְכִי־ <WH1980> come אַ֖תְּ <WH859> you מָלְכִ֥י <WH4427> thou [and] reign עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> over

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ הַתְּאֵנָ֔ה <WH8384> But the fig tree הֶחֳדַ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH2308> unto them Should I forsake אֶת־ <WH853> מָתְקִ֔י <WH4987> my sweetness וְאֶת־ <WH853> תְּנוּבָתִ֖י <WH8570> fruit הַטּוֹבָ֑ה <WH2896> and my good וְהָ֣לַכְתִּ֔י <WH1980> and go לָנ֖וּעַ <WH5128> to be promoted עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> carpenter

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> Then said הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> the trees לַגָּ֑פֶן <WH1612> unto the vine לְכִי־ <WH1980> come אַ֖תְּ <WH859> you [מָלֹוכִי כ] (מָלְכִ֥י <WH4427> consult ק) עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> over

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶם֙ הַגֶּ֔פֶן <WH1612> And the vine הֶחֳדַ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH2308> unto them Should I leave אֶת־ <WH853> תִּ֣ירוֹשִׁ֔י <WH8492> my wine הַֽמְשַׂמֵּ֥חַ <WH8055> which cheereth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וַאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> and men וְהָ֣לַכְתִּ֔י <WH1980> and go לָנ֖וּעַ <WH5128> to be promoted עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֵצִֽים׃ <WH6086> carpenter

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> Then said כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> all the trees אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאָטָ֑ד <WH329> unto the bramble לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> come אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you מְלָךְ־ <WH4427> thou [and] reign עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> over

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said הָאָטָד֮ <WH329> And the bramble אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֵצִים֒ <WH6086> unto the trees אִ֡ם <WH518> If בֶּאֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> If in truth אַתֶּם֩ <WH859> you מֹשְׁחִ֨ים <WH4886> ye anoint אֹתִ֤י <WH853> לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> me king עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5921> over בֹּ֖אוּ <WH935> over you [then] come חֲס֣וּ <WH2620> [and] put your trust בְצִלִּ֑י <WH6738> in my shadow וְאִם־ <WH518> if אַ֕יִן <WH369> else תֵּ֤צֵא <WH3318> come out אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> and if not let fire מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣אָטָ֔ד <WH329> of the bramble וְתֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> and devour אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְזֵ֥י <WH730> the cedars הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> of Lebanon

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now אִם־ <WH518> if בֶּאֱמֶ֤ת <WH571> truly וּבְתָמִים֙ <WH8549> and sincerely עֲשִׂיתֶ֔ם <WH6213> Now therefore if ye have done וַתַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <WH4427> king אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH40> in that ye have made Abimelech וְאִם־ <WH518> and if טוֹבָ֤ה <WH2895> be better עֲשִׂיתֶם֙ <WH6213> and if ye have dealt עִם־ <WH5973> with יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <WH3378> with Jerubbaal וְעִם־ <WH5973> with בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> and his house וְאִם־ <WH518> if כִּגְמ֥וּל <WH1576> unto him according to the deserving יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> of his hands עֲשִׂ֥יתֶם <WH6213> and have done לֽוֹ׃

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after נִלְחַ֥ם <WH3898> fought אָבִ֖י <WH1> (For my father עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and וַיַּשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> for you and adventured אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> his life מִנֶּ֔גֶד <WH5048> far וַיַּצֵּ֥ל <WH5337> and delivered אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> you out of the hand מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> of Midian

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> you קַמְתֶּ֨ם <WH6965> And ye are risen up עַל־ <WH5921> against בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house אָבִי֙ <WH1> against my father's הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day וַתַּהַרְג֧וּ <WH2026> and have slain אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> his sons שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> threescore and ten אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> persons עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> upon one וַתַּמְלִ֜יכוּ <WH4427> king אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶ֤לֶךְ <WH40> and have made Abimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH519> of his maidservant עַל־ <WH5921> over בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> over the men שְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> of Shechem כִּ֥י <WH3588> because אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <WH251> is your relative הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בֶּאֱמֶ֨ת <WH571> truly וּבְתָמִ֧ים <WH8549> and sincerely עֲשִׂיתֶ֛ם <WH6213> If ye then have dealt עִם־ <WH5973> with יְרֻבַּ֥עַל <WH3378> with Jerubbaal וְעִם־ <WH5973> with בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> and with his house הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this שִׂמְחוּ֙ <WH8055> [then] rejoice בַּאֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> ye in Abimelech וְיִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> and let him also rejoice גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֖וּא <WH1931> he בָּכֶֽם׃

וְאִם־ <WH518> if אַ֕יִן <WH369> else תֵּ֤צֵא <WH3318> come out אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> But if not let fire מֵאֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> from Abimelech וְתֹאכַ֛ל <WH398> and devour אֶת־ <WH853> בַּעֲלֵ֥י <WH1167> the men שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> of Shechem וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and the house מִלּ֑וֹא <WH4407> Millo וְתֵצֵ֨א <WH3318> come out אֵ֜שׁ <WH784> and let fire מִבַּעֲלֵ֤י <WH1167> from the men שְׁכֶם֙ <WH7927> of Shechem וּמִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and from the house מִלּ֔וֹא <WH4407> Millo וְתֹאכַ֖ל <WH398> and devour אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH40> Abimelech

וַיָּ֣נָס <WH5127> and fled יוֹתָ֔ם <WH3147> And Jotham וַיִּבְרַ֖ח <WH1272> ran away וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went בְּאֵ֑רָה <WH876> to Beer וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> there for fear אֲבִימֶ֥לֶךְ <WH40> of Abimelech אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> his brother פ
וַיָּ֧שַׂר <WH7786> had reigned אֲבִימֶ֛לֶךְ <WH40> When Abimelech עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over Israel שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> three שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> Then God ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> spirit רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> an evil בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> between Abimelech וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> and the men שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> of Shechem וַיִּבְגְּד֥וּ <WH898> dealt treacherously בַעֲלֵי־ <WH1167> and the men שְׁכֶ֖ם <WH7927> of Shechem בַּאֲבִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH40> with Abimelech

לָב֕וֹא <WH935> might come חֲמַ֖ס <WH2555> That the cruelty שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> [done] to the threescore and ten בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons יְרֻבָּ֑עַל <WH3378> of Jerubbaal וְדָמָ֗ם <WH1818> and their blood לָשׂ֞וּם <WH7760> be laid עַל־ <WH5921> on אֲבִימֶ֤לֶךְ <WH40> upon Abimelech אֲחִיהֶם֙ <WH251> their brother אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָרַ֣ג <WH2026> which slew אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and on בַּעֲלֵ֣י <WH1167> them and upon the men שְׁכֶ֔ם <WH7927> of Shechem אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who חִזְּק֥וּ <WH2388> strengthened אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> his hands לַהֲרֹ֥ג <WH2026> him in the killing אֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> of his brethren
